{"name": "St. Jerome’s Community Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Present passport, ID, or consular registration
Present proof of address
Registration Hours
Thursday: 10:00 AM - 1:00 PM
Friday: 10:00 AM - 1:00 PM
Distribution Schedule
Wednesday: 10:00 AM - 1:00 PM 
100 tickers will be distributed at 10:00 AM. 
Food is distributed per family once a month.
Please bring your own shopping cart or grocery bags and your QR code to pick up your food.
230 Alexander Ave, Bronx, NY 10454 this address can be used for pin location ", "email": "", "url": "https://jeromehands.com/foodpantry-1", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "330 E. 138TH ST.", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10454", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.809593, "longitude": -73.924797}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 402-7866", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
